name: Okoone
description:
Okoone is a leading provider of world-class mobile, web and cloud development services. Okoone provides managed development platforms for mobile and web applications, cloud backend infrastructures and enterprise solutions. Additionally, Okoone offers tailored mobile and web marketing services.
Okoone heavily relies best-in-class technologies to design and build solutions that help companies engage their customers, unlock revenues and accelerate their business.

Okoone is haedquartered in Hong Kong and has a development center in Phnom Penh, Cambodia in order to offer competitive pricing to its customers in the US, Europe and Asia without any compromise on the quality.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Sheung Wan Municipal Services 345 Queen's Road Central
